meanings: (분노·두려움으로) shake, tremble, quiver, shiver, shudder, quake
Verb be shaken off, be beaten off, fall off

meanings.meaning: shudder at the bare thought(=idea) of...

vlive.korean: 오 떨린다 이런 일이 있나? Oh I am nervous... Can this happen? 듣기 View video NCT : Jisung day💚💚
vlive.english: Oh I am nervous... Can this happen?

vlive.korean: [두근 설렘] - 떨린다 - 나 떨려! [Excited] - I'm nervous. - Me too! 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : [9회] 특명 : 2cm, 불협화음 지옥을 탈출하라!
'웅아 나 곧 고등학교 졸업해 너무 떨린다~' "Woong, I am graduating high school soon. I'm so nervous." 듣기 View video AB6IX : 깜짝왔웅😆
vlive.english: "Woong, I am graduating high school soon. I'm so nervous."

vlive.korean: 떨린다 - 좋아? I'm nervous. - Feeling good? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) : SKZ-TALKER GO!(슼즈토커 고!)] MANILA

examples.korean: Just thinking about the accident makes me shudder. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사고를 생각만 해도 난 몸이 떨린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I always get the shakes before exams. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 시험을 치기 전에는 항상 떨린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
